channel.title: New Faction PvP server (Invite all your friends) sv-ip.info
channel.description:
IP: sv-ip.info Website: http://www.yotacraft.info TeamSpeak: ts3.YotaCraft.info
Hello, YotaCraft server is based in PvP, Factions and Raiding! The server have a Shop in spawn to buy and sell items, and players ChestShop!
We also have voting rewards sutch as: Diamonds, gold, XP, and PremiumRank.
Join now and get: Full IronKit, 64 torches, 64 melon slides, 5000$Gold
Our server features: Jails! AntiCheat Watchdog! Bukkit version: 2820 (1.6.2-R0.1) TeamSpeak voice chat! ChestShop Website / Forums! Mature Staff! Welcoming Community! TNT damage disabled! mcMMO! FactionPlus! aAntiSpam Economy System! Market at Spawn! Public Enchanting Room! Public Nether World! Public 'The End' World! 24/7 Support!
Enjoy and have fun. :)
